title: Dark Universe
description: A spinetingling compilation of the author's best stories, culled from fifty years of writing, will disturb, terrify, and shock readers as they enter this nightmarish realm of darkness and evil. Original.Contents:• 'The Waiting, Windless Dark': William F. Nolan's Universe, by Christopher Conlon• The Underdweller (1974)• Saturday's Shadow (1979)• Lonely Train A'Comin' (1981)• And Miles to Go Before I Sleep (1958)• A Good Day (1997)• Heart's Blood (2000)• Stoner (1989)• The Cure (1988)• The Giant Man (1994)• At Diamond Lake (1994)• The Visit (1992)• The Partnership (1980)• Violation (1973)• The Yard (1987)• Ceremony (1985)• Coincidence (1974)• Major Prevue Here Tonight (1989)• Dead Call (1976)• Boyfren (1995)
author: William F. Nolan
